tool_description: Fast realtime exchange rates and conversion API
name: Currency Convert
title: Currency Convert

api_list.name: /usd
api_list.description: Current rates of currencies against USD
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://djinn-currency-convert-v1.p.rapidapi.com/usd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "djinn-currency-convert-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
